name: A River in Time
description:
Controls: 

Arrow keys for movement

A not yet finished game made with the theme of "Growing Up". Follow a boy on his journey down the river of time to become a man. Also there are monsters. And at least one ghost or ghost-like figure. Only finished up to 3 stages of a planned 6, but I kinda like it so will finish it and add in music, a bunch more story and some better graphics eventually.
